headline: CMC to Boost Commercial Portfolio With Acquisition of CP&P
summary: Commercial Metals to acquire CP&P for $675M, adding precast concrete solutions with stable margins and boosting cash flow strength.

raw.headline: CMC to Boost Commercial Portfolio With Acquisition of CP&P
raw.summary: Commercial Metals to acquire CP&P for $675M, adding precast concrete solutions with stable margins and boosting cash flow strength.

headline: POSCO Inks MOU to Promote Sewage Heat Utilization Project in Mongolia
summary: PKX's unit partners with Ulaanbaatar to launch a sewage heat project, aiming to cut coal use and ease severe winter pollution.

raw.headline: POSCO Inks MOU to Promote Sewage Heat Utilization Project in Mongolia
raw.summary: PKX's unit partners with Ulaanbaatar to launch a sewage heat project, aiming to cut coal use and ease severe winter pollution.

headline: Newmont Divests Orla Stake for $439M, Streamlines Portfolio
summary: NEM sells its entire Orla Mining stake for $439 million via TSX, sharpening focus and boosting liquidity for capital allocation.

raw.headline: Newmont Divests Orla Stake for $439M, Streamlines Portfolio
raw.summary: NEM sells its entire Orla Mining stake for $439 million via TSX, sharpening focus and boosting liquidity for capital allocation.

headline: Mosaic (MOS): Revisiting Valuation as Shares Climb Nearly 39% Without a Clear Catalyst
summary: When you look at Mosaic (MOS) right now, there is no single headline-grabbing event making waves, but the recent movement in its share price might catch the eye of anyone following the materials space. Without a definitive trigger in play, it is natural for investors to ask if the move is a sign of shifting fundamentals or just routine market noise. Sometimes, the lack of headline drama is its own story, especially when valuation could be quietly coming back into focus. In the bigger...
